alert.note: Alert for Eastern Marion; Eastern Putnam; Inland Flagler (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Jacksonville (Northeast Florida and Southeast Georgia)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 22 at 6:23PM EDT by NWS Jacksonville
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of west central Flagler, southeastern Marion and southeastern Putnam Counties through 700 PM EDT... At 623 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from near Crescent City to 6 miles northwest of Pittman. Movement was west at 20 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Crescent City, Pomona Park, Salt Springs, Juniper Springs, Fruitland, Welaka, Lake Como and Georgetown. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Eastern Marion; Eastern Putnam; Inland Flagler
